title: Bill and Melinda Gates speak out on vaccine timeline as global Covid cases rise
description: Bill and Melinda Gates, whose foundation has donated $350 million to fighting the pandemic, say a vaccine is unlikely in the next few weeks and that the global economy could take a decade to recover.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Death toll rises, dozens still missing amid West Coast wildfires
description: Multiple wildfires have left a path of destruction that stretches from Washington state to California. The economic losses from the fire could reach $150 billion.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Biden campaigns in Florida, vying with Trump for Latino vote
description: Joe Biden made his first swing through Florida as the Democratic nominee. Both Biden and President Trump are looking to boost support among Latino voters.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Israel signs historic diplomatic deal with UAE and Bahrain at White House
description: The United Arab Emirates and Bahrain are the first Arab nations to recognize Israel since 1994. President Trump called the deal the beginning of “a new Middle East,” but the agreement leaves out Palestine.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Schumer calls on HHS Sec. Azar to resign over handling of coronavirus pandemic
description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Shumer called for Health and Human Service Secretary Alex Azar to resign over a report that HHS officials tried to modify nonpartisan weekly updates that show how the fight against Covid is going.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Breonna Taylor’s family agrees to $12 million settlement with city of Louisville
description: The settlement comes more than six months after Breonna Taylor was killed by police inside her apartment building. It includes several police reforms, including changes to the approval process for search warrants.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Biden slams Trump for 'offensive' comments on veterans
description: Vice President Joe Biden called President Trump's comments on veterans "offensive" during a roundtable for servicemen and women.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Slow-moving Hurricane Sally heads toward Gulf Coast
description: Hurricane Sally is expected to hit Alabama head on, and the storm has already brought drenching rains, flooding parts of Florida and putting Mississippi on high alert.
source.name: NBC News
